Uses of Class
freemarker.core.UnformattableNumberException

  • Packages that use UnformattableNumberException 
    Package Description
    freemarker.core
    The seldom used or advanced parts of the fundamental FreeMarker API, compared to freemarker.template.

    • Uses of UnformattableNumberException in freemarker.core

      Methods in freemarker.core that throw UnformattableNumberException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract <MO extends TemplateMarkupOutputModel>
      MO      		 TemplateDateFormat.format(TemplateDateModel dateModel, MarkupOutputFormat<MO> outputFormat)
      [Not yet used, might changes in 2.3.24 final] Formats the date/time/dateTime to markup instead of to plain text, or returns null that will make FreeMarker call TemplateDateFormat.format(TemplateDateModel) and escape its result.
      <MO extends TemplateMarkupOutputModel>
      boolean      		 TemplateDateFormat.format(TemplateDateModel dateModel, MarkupOutputFormat<MO> outputFormat, Writer out)
      [Not yet used, might changes in 2.3.24 final] Same as TemplateDateFormat.format(TemplateDateModel, MarkupOutputFormat), but prints the result to a Writer instead of returning it.
      abstract String TemplateNumberFormat.format(TemplateNumberModel numberModel) 
      abstract <MO extends TemplateMarkupOutputModel>
      MO      		 TemplateNumberFormat.format(TemplateNumberModel dateModel, MarkupOutputFormat<MO> outputFormat)
      [Not yet used, might changes in 2.3.24 final] Formats the number to markup instead of to plain text, or returns null that will make FreeMarker call TemplateNumberFormat.format(TemplateNumberModel) and escape its result.
      <MO extends TemplateMarkupOutputModel>
      boolean      		 TemplateNumberFormat.format(TemplateNumberModel dateModel, MarkupOutputFormat<MO> outputFormat, Writer out)
      [Not yet used, might changes in 2.3.24 final] Same as TemplateNumberFormat.format(TemplateNumberModel, MarkupOutputFormat), but prints the result to a Writer instead of returning it.
      static Number TemplateFormatUtil.getNonNullNumber(TemplateNumberModel numberModel)
      Utility method to extract the Number from an TemplateNumberModel, and throw UnformattableNumberException with a standard error message if that's null.
